name: Class Coin
description: CLASS Coin is the Utility Token type of digital asset created by the CLASS Coffee Ltd. The Coin can be used in trading product and service, and is changeable in ownership via trading. The Holders can pay for product and service by using CLASS Coin which belongs to the CLASS Coffee Ltd. The Coin exists in the online community called Velaverse and can be traded for NFT and Land as well as spent for doing various online activities organized by the Coin developer.
